text: 1.4: 1 T 4.7; 2 T 2.14-16; Ta 1.14Ndu mbe suaŋrim, mbe mba fhura nzɨgi neŋgi nzari khɨni gum, mbe won nzɨgi zɨri zitav, mbe buni, neŋgi, mbe nta thari. Mba khesharigi buni, nta fhura mbe ndɨkndɨgi ŋgi buni ma. Nta mben kurarim, mbe Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Nta vhɨra mben kurarim, mbe Fhe Bakɨme nzan muun za mbui vuzvuk, mba vuzvuk, ana guigira bigi khothɨgi tɨv, mbe tuituigip ana kaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
